resources.string: Access to the camera is needed for detection
This application cannot run because it does not have the camera permission. The application will now exit.
Ocr dependencies cannot be downloaded due to low device storage

Allergy Scanner is an Android app that allows people with allergies to easily check food ingredient labels with their phone.

 Instrcutions:
 1. enter your allergy into the text field by tapping on Type allergy here.
 3. click the green ADD button to the right of where you entered your allergy.
 4. To delete an allergy from the list, tap and hold on it.
 5. Click on Scan Label to allow this app to access your device camera
 6. Point your device camera at a food ingredient label.
 	a. ingredients contained in your allergy list show up in red (detected allergy).
